channel.title: Franklin, a GPTChat bot
channel.description: Recent content on Franklin, a GPTChat bot

item.description: Franklin is a GPT3 backed IRC bot Franklin runs inside irssi. Setup You should configure trigger.pl to autoload on irssi start, and optionally configure your channel autojoins. Create an API key, then put it in a file called api.key in the scripts working directory. You’ll need to set up a webserver with a directory under it’s root called said (usually something like /var/www/html/said/), that is writable by the call_gpt3.sh script.
